mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed SET iuser = #{iuser}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed, A.contents, A.location, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.iuser AS writerIuser, B.nm AS writerNm, B.pic AS writerPic, IF(C.ifeed > 0, 1, 0) AS isFav FROM t_feed A JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav C ON A.ifeed = C.ifeed AND C.iuser = #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{feedCnt}
